scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Includes Bible record with slave births (5 leaves) and index (1 leaf). The record is a typed transcript. Areas covered are Nelson and Albemarle counties, Virginia. Other surnames mentioned are Blackenburg, Gregory, Horne, Oldham, Page, Stoneman, Taylor, Templeman, Ware and Whitten
